disciplinepoliciescurtailfightingandbullying.Studentsand
staff regularly participate in emergency preparedness drills to
ensure their safety in the event of an emergency. The safety
plan is developed with input from local agencies and the school
community. The plan is reviewed and approved by the School
Site Council (SSC) and presented at several awareness sessions.]
